AffiliatesPhonesXML.DeliveryCost: Providing your order is received before 4pm, your order will be usually be delivered the next working day, or otherwise you can select the day you would like your order to be delivered. We also provide the option of delivery before 10am for an additional fee of £9.99 (includes the option of choosing a Saturday before midday). This service is only available when items are in stock and may be subject to your postcode.

PhoneData.Conclusion: The Samsung C3050 is a great little all-rounder and value for money with camera, video, music and plenty of memory capacity.
PhoneData.Feature1: Average rating*:
PhoneData.Name: C3050 Black

PhoneData.Conclusion: With the Walkman® technology, 3.2 megapixel camera, 3G ability and connectivity, the Sony Ericsson W705 brings you a wide range of functionality in a stylish little package.
PhoneData.Feature1: Average rating*:
PhoneData.Name: W705

PhoneData.Conclusion: The stunning new Chocolate BL20 picks up from where the original Chocolate left off with a great range of features in a stylish and minimal design.
PhoneData.Name: Chocolate BL20 Purple
